events.name: Google Cloud Next '18 Extended - Indore

venue.name: Techracers
venue.address_1: Indore Office  6th Floor, Crystal IT Park  Indore 452014 (M.P.)  +91 731 407 7574

events.description:
We proudly invite you to our First meetup that is on topic "Decentralized Applications (DAPP)" along with hands on experience on Data Engineering and Machine Learning with Google Cloud Platform.

Topic for Discussion on Meetup :

ùüèùüè ùêÄùêå - ùüèùüê ùêèùêå : "Decentralized Applications (DAPP)" - This session includes fundamental knowledge and practical experience to build a minimum viable product on the Ethereum blockchain.As an attendee, you will get a practical exposure to the decentralized application (Dapp) development process using Solidity

ùüèùüê ùêèùêå -ùüê ùêèùêå: Data and Engineering - In this session you will analyse historical observations using BigQuery and use in conjunction with other datasets.

Come and join us for this Cloud event on ùüèùüëùê≠ùê° ùêéùêúùê≠ùê®ùêõùêûùê´ at ùóßùó≤ùó∞ùóµùó•ùóÆùó∞ùó≤ùóøùòÄ, ùü≤ùòÅùóµ ùóôùóπùóºùóºùóø, ùóñùóøùòÜùòÄùòÅùóÆùóπ ùóúùòÅ ùó£ùóÆùóøùó∏ ùóúùóªùó±ùóºùóøùó≤.

Join us for this year's Next Extended event, where we'll bring together cloud enthusiasts and the developer community to be a part of the Next '18 experience.

This year, we will be diving deep into cloud with technical keynotes, a hands-on TOPIC (Kubernetes, ML, or Google Cloud Certification) lab, and local speakers.

As an attendee, you'll not only be a part of our vibrant cloud community but also receive free access to Qwiklabs (a $55+ value)!

Don't forget to bring a laptop (PC, Mac, or Chromebook), and get ready for the best Next Extended yet!

Make sure to RSVP to receive upcoming information about this event, and visit https://cloudnext.withgoogle.com/ to learn more about Google Cloud Next '18.

ùêèùêí: It would be a hands on session, so it‚Äôs highly recommended to bring laptops.

For any queries you can drop a mail to [masked]
events.how_to_find_us: IT Crystal Park infront of Davv University,Khandwa Road

events.name: Hands on with Cloud Pub/Sub & Cloud Functions

venue.name: Incuspaze
venue.address_1: 6th Floor, Princes Business Skyline, Vijay Nagar Above Westside Showroom, Agra Bombay Road

events.description:
Note: This will be a hands-on session. Participants are requested to bring their own laptops.

GCDC Indore is back again with the next meetup of the year ‚Äì Hands on with Google Cloud Functions & Pub/Sub. Together, Pub/Sub and Cloud Functions can be used to automate 90% of serverless tasks for relatively cheap. They are infinitely scalable yet extremely affordable.

The agenda for the upcoming event is as follows:

1. Introduction to Cloud Pub/Sub integration with Google Cloud Functions ‚Äì Tushar Pal
2. Introduction to Google Cloud Functions & demonstration ‚Äì Aayush Agrawal
3. Hands on session
4. Networking session

Venue:
Name: Incuspaze Indore
Address: 213, Princes' Business Skyline, Agra Bombay Rd, Sheetal Nagar, Scheme No.54 Vijay Nagar Indore Madhya Pradesh[masked] IN, Agra Bombay Rd, Indore, Madhya Pradesh

Timing: 10 am to 2 pm

We are experimenting with a new format where along with our standard meetup we are also adding a new window for networking.

That‚Äôs all folks! We look forward to meeting you there. We only have a limited number of seats which will be provisioned on first come first serve basis.

events.name: Deep dive into serverless computing

venue.name: Sky Space - Premium Co-working Offices in Indore

events.description:
GCDC Indore is back again with the first meetup of the year 2019! We will be focusing on Serverless architecture which allows you to deploy your code without having to worry about scalability of the underlying infrastructure. We will also feature a session on E-Education and the various online courses and certifications available.

The agenda for the upcoming event is as follows:

1. Introduction to Serverless Technologies, benefits of serverless.
2. E-education awareness session.
3. Networking session.

Date: 10 February 2019
Venue: Skyspace Coworking
Address: 3rd Floor, Plot No. -[masked], PU - 4 Behind Malhar Mega Mall, Vijay Nagar, Indore, Madhya Pradesh[masked]
Timing: 10 am to 2 pm

That‚Äôs all folks! We look forward to meeting you there. We only have a limited number of seats which will be provisioned on first come first serve basis.

events.name: GCDC: ML and Cloud Study Jam '19

venue.name: Sky Space - Premium Co-working Offices in Indore

events.description:
Announcing ML and Cloud Study Jam ‚Äô19

New to machine learning or cloud but don't know where to start? Join us for a Machine Learning and Cloud Study Jams.

Get official Google training, a $55+ value, free of charge. You will get hands-on experience with several machine learning tools from Google and with the Cloud Console.

You will have free access to more labs you can finish at home. Complete all labs in the quest and earn a Google-hosted badge for your online profile, and additional 30 days access to the training platform to compete in any labs you want.

Topic: Machine Learning
Date: 17th Feb‚Äô19
Time: 10 AM to 2 PM
Venue: Skyspace Premium Coworking Indore
Address: 3rd Floor, Plot No. -[masked], PU - 4 Behind Malhar Mega Mall, Vijay Nagar, Indore, Madhya Pradesh[masked]

Agenda :
10 : 00 am - Welcome & Introduction to Machine learning
10 : 30 am - Lab: Introduction to SQL for BigQuery and Cloud SQL
11 : 30 am - Break
11 : 40 am - BigQuery: Qwik Start - Console
12 : 00 am - Bigtable: Qwik Start - Command Line
01 : 00 pm - Cloud Speech API
02 : 00 pm - Event ends - THANK YOU!

Topic: Machine Learning
Date: 22th Feb‚Äô19
Time: 9 AM to 1 PM
Venue: SIRT-SAGE University
Address: Kailod Kartal, Dewas Bypass Rd, Rau, Indore, Madhya Pradesh[masked]
Agenda :
09 : 00 am - Welcome & Introduction to Machine learning
09 : 30 am - Lab: Introduction to SQL for BigQuery and Cloud SQL
10 : 30 am - Break
10 : 40 am - BigQuery: Qwik Start - Console
11 : 00 am - Bigtable: Qwik Start - Command Line
12 : 00 pm - Cloud Speech API
01 : 00 pm - Event ends - THANK YOU!

Topic: Machine Learning
Date: 3rd Mar‚Äô19
Time: 10 AM to 2 PM
Venue: Skyspace Premium Coworking Indore
Address: 3rd Floor, Plot No. -[masked], PU - 4 Behind Malhar Mega Mall, Vijay Nagar, Indore, Madhya Pradesh[masked]
Agenda :
10 : 00 am - Introduction to APIs in Google
11 : 00 am - Extract, Analyze, and Translate Text from Images with the Cloud ML APIs
12 : 00 am - Break
12 : 10 am - Awwvision: Cloud Vision API from a Kubernetes Cluster
01 : 00 pm - Cloud ML Engine: Qwik Start
02 : 00 pm - Event ends - THANK YOU!

Please Register: https://goo.gl/forms/24J2C08jVz3m6FUl2

Bring a laptop (fully charged, will have limited power sockets). We will provide Wi-Fi. The labs will run on all of the latest versions of the popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed

I step forwarded with a new Organization Diaspark. I learned but my instinct for a higher standard didn't let me to be at peace .

organizers.name: Google Cloud Developer C.
organizers.bio:
Google Cloud Developers Community(GCDC) Indore is an open community backed by Google.
GCDC started with a vision to conduct meetups that mainly deals with Cloud technologies on Google Cloud Platforms.
